title.en: Unparalleled in Modern Times ~Learn Magic in Another World, and Become Peerless in the Modern Age~

altTitles.ja: 現代無双～異世界で魔法を覚えて、現代で無双する～

altTitles.ja-ro: Gendai Musou ~Isekai de Mahou o Oboete, Gendai de Musou suru~

description.en: This is a story of a world where monsters appear in Japan, but Japan becomes a super resource-rich country thanks to the materials from the monsters that are defeated. Kazami Makoto was an ordinary boy who aspires to be a monster hunter. One day, he is attacked by monsters and trapped in another world. He somehow manages to escape from the other world, and is the only person in the world who can use magic from the other world. Makoto learns that the magic of the other world is more effective against monsters than the police or the Self-Defense Forces, so he throws himself into the dangerous other world once again, risks his life to conquer it, brings the magic back to Japan, and becomes a monster hunter recognized by everyone as an SSS rank.

biography.en:
Given name: なずな
Family name: 三木
Birthday: Unknown

A Taiwanese light novel writer and manga author who aims to be the fastest in the industry. (Author's Twitter)
